body_html: This code is considered legacy because the author is no longer maintaining it, and it doesn't have many users. In fact, I hope to remove it for TF 1.7. If you'd like to make these kinds of modifications, you may want to copy it under the Apache 2 license into your own repository and make them there?

body: This code is considered legacy because the author is no longer maintaining it, and it doesn't have many users.  In fact, I hope to remove it for TF 1.7.  If you'd like to make these kinds of modifications, you may want to copy it under the Apache 2 license into your own repository and make them there?
